sponsors.title: Sponsors

landingPage.title: Are You Looking For A {tech} Freelancer?

skills.experience: A Senior Frontend Developer with focus on <mark>{tech}</mark> and +{years} years experience?
skills.development: Support to build a <mark>complex web application</mark> or mobile app?
skills.tShaped: A <mark>T-shaped developer</mark> who has frontend expertise and cross-discipline competences in backend development, test engineering and DevOps?
skills.codeQuality: A developer who has a focus on high quality, <mark>clean</mark>, well-documented and easily maintainable <mark>code</mark>?
skills.partner: A reliable, honest and <mark>professional partner</mark> to successfully finish your project in budget and time?

landingPage.rightPlace: and you are in the right place!

blogPage.title: Blog
blogPage.introductionLine1: When 280 characters on {twitter} doesn't quite cut it, I'll write my extended thoughts here. Usually I write a new article once a month.
blogPage.introductionLine2: {newsletter} to get informed about new articles.
blogPage.searchAlternative: You can also search blog posts using {google} oder in the {minimalList}.
blogPage.editOnGitHubInfoLine1: Find an issue with this post? Think you could clarify, update or add something?
blogPage.editOnGitHubInfoLine2: All my posts are available to edit on Github. Any fix, little or small, is appreciated!
blogPage.similarArticlesLine1: If you found this article helpful.
blogPage.similarArticlesLine2: You will love these ones as well.

projectsPage.detailedProjectList: if you want to have a detailed list of projects I have worked on in my professional career.
projectsPage.workedWith: I am proud to have worked with:
projectsPage.businessProjectsExcerpt: The following abstract of my business project will give you an idea how I helped my clients in previous projects:

segmentationTool.title: Development of a video segmentation tool
segmentationTool.keyContribution1: Planned & executed the extraction of the segmentation tool from a monolithic application
segmentationTool.keyContribution2: Set up, developed and maintained multiple microservices
segmentationTool.keyContribution3: Designed and implemented a Websocket-based dashboard

vhv.title: Development of a car tariff calculator
vhv.keyContribution1: Wrote React wrapper components to integrate the Stencil web components into the Guidewire project
vhv.keyContribution2: Developed & maintained web components in Stencil
vhv.keyContribution3: Migrated separated Stencil & Storybook repositories to a monorepo

tipsPage.title: Vue Tips
tipsPage.introLine1: This page includes some <mark>Vue.js</mark> tips that are too short for a dedicated blog post.
tipsPage.introLine2: {newsletter} to get informed about new Vue tips.
tipsPage.searchAlternative: You can also search tips using {google} or in the {minimalList}.

aboutPage.title: Meet Michael
aboutPage.paragraph1: My name is <mark>Michael Hoffmann</mark>, I'm a freelance software engineer based in Munich/Germany. I hold a Masters in Electrical Engineering from the renown Technical University of Munich (TUM) and have <mark>{years}+ years</mark> of professional experience.
aboutPage.paragraph2: I work for businesses of all sizes and have experience with both small and medium enterprises and corporates. In my career I have developed, maintained and launched multiple projects from scratch or improved an existing code base. Get in touch, if you like to receive a detailed list of projects I have worked on so far.
aboutPage.paragraph3: <mark>Programming is my passion</mark> – but especially developing complex business applications both in <mark>frontend and in backend</mark>. I totally enjoy my work as a freelance developer and developing {privateProjectsLink} under the pseudonym Mokkapps. The reason why I write {blogLink} (also for {inDepthDevLink}) and {publicationLink} is that I like to share my knowledge with others. Therefore, I also try to share most of my projects on {gitHubLink}.
aboutPage.paragraph4: If I do not invest my time in coding I'm usually playing video games or doing sports.
aboutPage.paragraph5: Just contact me if you would like me to work for you.
aboutPage.paragraph6: Visit Uses if you are interested in the software and hardware I use for software development.
aboutPage.whatIDo1: I specialize in building applications written in <mark>{tech}</mark>. I always develop them with your end-user in mind as this will also help you to meet your business goals
aboutPage.whatIDo2: I am interested in doing development work in <mark>backend & frontend</mark> applications.
aboutPage.whatIDo3: I am <mark>reliable and honest</mark> to my customers and clients.
aboutPage.whatIDo4: I produce high quality, <mark>clean</mark>, well-documented and easily maintainable <mark>code</mark> while respecting deadlines and budgets.
aboutPage.whatIDo5: I use <mark>high code quality standards</mark> and static code analyzer.
aboutPage.whatIDo6: I <mark>like to write tests</mark>, no matter if unit, integration or end-to-end (E2E).
aboutPage.whatIDo7: I like strict typing in JavaScript, especially using <mark>TypeScript</mark>.
aboutPage.whatIDo8: I use <mark>modern CSS</mark> using Grid, Flexbox, and Animations.
aboutPage.whatIDo10: I create beautifully <mark>responsive products</mark> which work cross a variety of devices and browsers.
aboutPage.whoIWorkWithDesc: I enjoy working in a close relationship with international teams on-site or remote. It is great fun for me to learn about new industries, especially if the product has a positive impact.
aboutPage.whatDontDoDesc1: Usually, I do not develop simple websites but am more interested in complex web applications or mobile apps.
aboutPage.whatDontDoDesc2: I can provide simple logos or help you pick typography or colors. In case you need further help with your brand, I am happy to connect you with a trusted graphic and brand designer.

freelancerContest.title: IT-Freelancer of the Year 2021 (3rd place)
freelancerContest.description: The renowned competition for the 'IT Freelancer of the Year', which includes non-cash prizes, takes place every two years. The first competition was held in 2005 - the organizers are IT Freelancer Magazin, Gesellschaft für Informatik and DBITS. The prize sponsors of the competition are HAYS, GULP, SOLCOM, Etengo (Deutschland) AG and SThree - each of which is one of the top 10 agencies for the placement of IT freelancers in Germany.

contactPage.title: Want to get in touch?
contactPage.contactSuccessDescr: Thanks for your message. I'll answer your request as quick as possible.
contactPage.meetingDescription: Book your free call where we talk about your project. Please first check my availability and share as much info, as possible so we can get the most out of our first catch-up.
contactPage.contactDescription: Complete the form below and I’ll get back to you within 2 business days

newsletterPage.newsletterInfoLine1: Like what you're reading? I have something for you!
newsletterPage.newsletterInfoLine2: I send out a weekly newsletter that I hope inspires you to build new things. Its main focus is on <mark>Vue.js</mark>. If you're enjoying my content and want more, feel free to subscribe!
newsletterPage.shortInfo: Do you want to stay up to date on Vue.js? For the latest Vue.js articles and projects straight to your inbox, subscribe to my newsletter.
newsletterPage.noSpam: No spam - unsubscribe at any time!
newsletterPage.revueInfo: By subscribing, you agree with Revue’s {termsAndServiceLink} and {privacyPolicyLink}
newsletterPage.subscribeError: Failed to subscribe. Please try again later!
newsletterPage.alternativeLine1: Don't want me filling your inbox?
newsletterPage.alternativeLine2: No problem. If you'd like to keep up with my content another way, you can follow me on {twitterLink}. Whenever I post new content, I like to talk about it there.

categoriesPage.title: Categories
categoriesPage.singlePostInCategory: There is {count} post in this category
categoriesPage.multiplePostsInCategory: There are {count} posts in this category

testimonials.testimonialName1: D.T., Product Owner, ProSiebenSat1 Tech Solutions GmbH
testimonials.testimonialText1: Michael made an important contribution to the progress of the product and, as a team member, enriched the teamwork. He created a large part of the basis that our users can now enjoy working with the app.
testimonials.testimonialName2: T.M., Head of Department Audi mobility, jambit GmbH
testimonials.testimonialText2: Michael worked as a permanent employee in our company and has always done an absolutely excellent job. I can only recommend him!
